talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for the business. You're mighty
generous, sir.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Hey, now. President Yunobo worked hard
to build all this. Get your feet offa there.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Welcome!<sp:5:0:0> We're the <clr:0000>YunoboCo store<clr:ffff>,
offering rock-bottom prices every day.

That's right—our prices are <clr:0000>half<clr:ffff> of what
you'd normally pay!

That's my greeting, anyway. But right now
we're sold out.
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>We're the real deal—the <clr:0000>YunoboCo store<clr:ffff>!


Our prices are only <clr:0000>half<clr:ffff> of what you'd
normally pay!

That's the spiel, anyway... Right now
we're all sold out.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>The clothes you're wearing right now?
Maybe try offering 'em when you're not
wearing 'em, huh?
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Sir, you don't have enough rupees. We'll
always give you good prices, so come on
back once you've got the rupees.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Whoops, it looks like your pouch is full.
Please come again after you've sorted out
your things.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Welcome!<sp:5:0:0> We're the <clr:0000>YunoboCo store<clr:ffff>,
offering rock-bottom prices every day.

That's right—our prices are <clr:0000>half<clr:ffff> of what
you'd normally pay!

We're able to keep offerin' these low, low
prices because <clr:0000>YunoboCo <clr:ffff>mines our
ore directly.
Com_Talk_00:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy><clr:ffff>We'll buy from you at fair prices! Sell
yer stuff without a care here.
Com_Talk_05c: <sp:3:0:2:0001>I'll buy as much as you have.
Com_Talk_31:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting><clr:ffff>YunoboCo's famous for this! So, how
many would you like?
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I've been hearin' that some of our
younger Gorons are targeting the likes
of you—of Hylians, to be specific.
Ever since the <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>
showed up, they've all been actin' odd.

You watch yourself, yeah?
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>We'll buy from you at the normal prices...


but at <clr:0000>YunoboCo stores<clr:ffff>, we sell ore at
<clr:0000>HALF <clr:ffff>of what you'd normally pay!

Feel free to look around.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>That store's owned by a guy
named Bladon.

He's out right now. If you wanna buy
something, you'll have to wait till he
gets back.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Now that I think about it...


He left for <clr:0000>Goron City <clr:ffff>to buy <clr:0000>marbled
rock roast <clr:ffff>and hasn't come back for
some days now.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Just what is he up to, anyhow?
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Since the marbled rock roasts went away,
the young Gorons have been working at
breakneck paces!
It's all I can do to try to keep up with
their diligence.
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000><snd:Happy>YunoboCo<clr:ffff> is the <clr:0000>company <clr:ffff>that handles all
the mining in this area.

The prez wants to make ore more
accessible so everyone can enjoy it!

We're able to sell it directly to you, the
customer, at <clr:0000>half<clr:ffff> the normal price.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>We're always rockin' at the
<clr:0000>YunoboCo store<clr:ffff>!

Our prices are just <clr:0000>half<clr:ffff> what you'd
normally pay! It's the best place to
buy in bulk, that's for sure.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Our prices are just <clr:0000>half<clr:ffff> of what you'd
normally pay. It's a great opportunity to
buy in bulk.
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks to you, we're fresh outta stock.


I'll get some flint mined up and ready for
ya soon, so check back later.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for the business. That was a
mighty fine deal, yes, sir.
